name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: Welfare Scientist
bio: Leading researcher in animal welfare science with expertise in evidence-based welfare assessment. Focuses on measurable welfare outcomes and scientific validity.

name: Dr. James Mitchell
title: Policy Expert
bio: Expert in animal welfare policy and regulatory frameworks. Specializes in translating welfare science into effective governance structures.

name: Dr. Maria Rodriguez
title: Agricultural Economist
bio: Agricultural economist specializing in the economics of animal production systems. Analyzes trade-offs between welfare improvements and economic viability.

name: Dr. David Kimani
title: Conservationist
bio: Wildlife conservation expert focusing on the intersection of animal welfare and ecosystem health. Advocates for sustainable use frameworks.

name: Patricia Walsh
title: Industry Representative
bio: Industry veteran with deep knowledge of production systems and supply chains. Focuses on practical implementation and gradual transitions.

name: Dr. Amara Patel
title: Ethics Coordinator
bio: Ethics scholar specializing in animal sentience and moral frameworks. Advocates for rights-based approaches to animal welfare governance.
